title: Cognitive Fatigue Management and Immersion Enhancement Strategies for Online Science Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Design considerations for online learning environments post-COVID-19, accounting for workplace efficiency for professionals

learning_goals: Within two weeks, learners can identify three or more cognitive fatigue factors during online learning and develop mitigation strategies.
Learners can improve immersion evaluation metrics by over 20% when studying online science content using self-directed learning approaches.
By week four, learners can present quantitative data on cognitive fatigue management and immersion enhancement results through project-based assessments.

resources: Immersion Analysis Tools (e.g., Eye Tracking Software)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
